textBeforeTable: Flat view Next unread Next Previous First Parent Forum Complain Reply   Reply with quote   Regards, Duncan C dpreview and PBase supporter. http://www.pbase.com/duncanc/image/61499136/small.jpg http://www.pbase.com/duncanc My macro gallery: http://www.pbase.com/duncanc/macro_pictures&page=all The other poster had a good point about safety cables. I suggest trying a cord to each flash and tying it to the rigging, so if your clamp fails, a falling flash doesn't brain the customers. Hotshoe flash clamp on Amazon If you're going to use a mini ball-head then agreed, there isn't much point in dedicated clamps. I have a hotshoe flash -- hide signature --
